Class ShareFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShareFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ShareFile>

    public class ShareFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ShareFile>
    This class holds the file representation for files in the FileServer. Files have some meta data that handles accessibility, which includes a group and an owner. Enforcing accessibility should be handled by GroupThread.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShareFile

        public ShareFile(java.lang.String _owner,
         java.lang.String _group,
         java.lang.String _path)
        Constructor. Creates a new file with the given owner, group, and path.
        Parameters:
        _owner - The String representing the username of the owner.
        _group - The String representing the group that is allowed to have access to the file.
        _path - The String representing the path that the file will be found in on the Server.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Gets the path of the file.
        Returns:
        Returns the String representing the location of the file, including the file name.

      • getOwner

        public java.lang.String getOwner()
        Gets the owner of the file.
        Returns:
        Returns the String representing the username of the owner of the file.

      • getGroup

        public java.lang.String getGroup()
        Gets the group that has access to the file.
        Returns:
        Returns the String representing the group that can access the file.
